component.name: RunManager
component.selected: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor

task.summary: Removed unnecessary animation files
Default task
- Implemented New Input Controller - Refactor Old Input System into New Input System
implemented Collision detection
Implemented CounterInteract
Implemented EventHandler for Interact Updated Visual counter
- Implemented Scriptable Object for having multiple type of kitchenObjects - Implemented Interface for carry kitchenObject to Player.cs - Player can spawn Kitchen Object over Clearcounter

- Refactor ClearCounter and ContainerCounter into BaseCounter and It has implemented Interface. - Container has Visual and Animation script attached to it. - Refactor ClearCounter and ContainerCounter derived from base class called BaseContainer using Prefab Variant
- Fixed movement direction issue while rotating towards clear counter - Implemented Cutting Counter and logic -
- Implemented all type of cutting ingredients - CuttingCounter.cs which takes Input and Output - Cutting counter only works if recipe has Input and Output

- Cutting Progress bar Canvas has been implemented with various Camera Mode - Trash Counter has been implemented - Fixed - Exceptional Handled once you have cut an KitchenObject into Slices. No longer able to cut once its done - Organized Script Structure and Hierarchy Structure

- Implemented StateMachine for Cooking meat to burn - Implemented StoveCounter for cooking meat to burn - Created Scriptable Objects for Burning, Cooked and Uncooked meat - Created Prefabs for Burning, Cooked and Uncooked meat - Implemented IProgressBar which has been implemented in both Progressbar

- Implemented Plate Prefab, Scriptable Objects and complete burger Plate - Burger Ingredient logic - Plate can store Slices - Refactor BaseCounter.cs, - Added new Scripts PlateCompleteVisual.cs, PlateCounterVisual.cs and PlateCounterVisual.cs etc - Added MeatPattyBurned.prefab
- Implemented a visual way to represent how many ingredient a plate contains. - PlateIconSingleUI.cs handle and SetUI Icon logic - PlateIconUI UpdateVisual using event

- Implemented a basic moving ShaderGraph for Deliver - Implemented a comparision logic to check if player deliver the right recipe to the customer - Created a bunch of Recipe with scriptableObject and a list of Recipe that we offer
- Implemented a Package TMP - Implemented DeliveryManagerSingleUI.cs update actual recipe name and Icon. - Implemented DeliveryManagerUI.cs display actual recipe on screen
- Fixed Interact and Alternative Interact action for Cutting counter - Added Music on GamePlay.unity

- Implemented AudioClips for Player's Footsteps, Pickup, drop, stove, trash and On Delivery Fail and Success. - PlayerSounds.cs : It is specific for player footstep - SoundManager.cs : This is control every sound played by AudioSource - StoveCounterSound.cs : While stove is frying or fried - Created Scriptable object to organize all the sound clip assets

- Organized namespace and script structure - Implemented GameOverUI, Countdown UI and Timer UI - GameManager.cs is to control game Flow using State Machine - GameCountDownStartUI.cs is controlling countDown logic - GameOverUI.cs is handling GameOver Logic - GamePlayingClockUI.cs is handling timer logic
- Added MainMenu.unity - Added LoadingScene.unity - Implemented Loading Logic - Implemented Main menu Logic
- Implemented Pause Game - ResetDataStaticManager.cs Clear all the static data - Added new Button in PlayerInput - GamePauseUI.cs handle Pause logic
- Implemented OptionUI.cs for the MusicManager.cs and SoundManager.cs - Added MusicManager.cs handle music itself - Added Save and load option setting using PlayerPrefs
- Implemented Input bindings - Extended PlayInput Controller for GetBinding, GetBindingText etc

- Implemented GamePad controller and Selected Btn while switching Keyboard to Mouse. - OptionUI.cs and PlayerInputController.cs have relevant functions - GamePauseUI.cs contains all the essential btn and Text to show up

- Polish Stage - Added Walls on GamePlay.unity - Added Animation on Count Down Number and Sound - Added TutorialUI.cs - Remove Time logic from Start off the game and Set using GameState in GameManager.cs and PlatesCounter.cs - Checking a condition if GameState == GamePlay on DeliveryManager.cs
- In StoveCounter implemented Warning Sound, Icon and Animation using StoveBurnWarningUI.cs - In DeliveryManager implemented dynamic popup and Animation using DeliveryResultUI.cs -

- Synchronous Player Animation - In Player.cs has two ClientRpc and ServerRpc to handle Deliver Recipe and Recipe Spawn. - SelectedCounterVisual.cs has fixed and Implemented LocalInstance for each Players. - In Player.cs has two Static Events for Fire off during Pickup and Highlight Counter

- Synchronous Picking Object and Kitchen Parent Object. - BaseCounter.cs and KitchenObject.cs are derived from NetworkBehaviour in order to work with ServerRpc and ClientRpc. - FollowTransform.cs It's just a transform to follow up for kitchenObject. - KitchenGameMultiplayer.cs It handle SpawnKitchenObject on Server with few helper functions. - KitchenObjectListSO.cs.cs It does contain all of the KitchenObjects Prefab,
- Synchronous Plates Spawn and Remove - PlatesCounter.cs does implement ServerRpc and ClientRpc in order to work together.

KitchenObject.cs has implemented KitchenGameMultiplayer.cs has Implemented a Static Function for DestroyKitchenObjectServerRpc and ClearKitchenObjectOnParentClientRpc which are going to handle Ownership for Server. TrashCounter.cs has Implemented and Separated logic for ServerRpc and ClientRpc in order to Destroy Network Object. DeliveryCounter.cs Instead of DestroySelf and DestroyKitchenObject from Server

- Synchronous CuttingCounter.cs - Separated logic for ServerRpc and Client Rpc - Created InteractLogicPlaceObjectOnCounterServerRpc() and InteractLogicPlaceObjectOnCounterClientRpc() are Resetting CuttingProgress - Created CutObjectServerRpc() and CutObjectClientRpc() for cutting - Created TestCuttingProgressDoneServerRpc() This is actually handling Destroy and Spawn.

- GetKitchenObjectSoIndex() and GetKitchenObjectSoFromIndex() has made Public in KitchenGameMultiplayer.cs - StoveCounter.cs Implemented Three NetworkVariable for _fryingState, _fryingTimer and _burningTimer in order to Synchronous with Server. - SetStateIdleServerRpc() It handles the currentState. - InteractLogicPlaceObjectOnCounterServerRpc() - SetFryingRecipeSoClientRpc() - SetBurningRecipeSoClientRpc()
- ClearCounter.cs, StoveCounter.cs and CuttingCounter.cs has Fixed Destroy kitchenObject. - PlateKitchenObject.cs now Contain Server and Client Combination in order to AddIngredient.

- Player.cs extensible for new feature using LayerMask - CapsuleCollider has replaced with BoxCollider which helps to move on corner and won-t stuck anymore - Implemented additional LayerMask for interaction using Trigger etc
- GameManager.cs Synchronous [GameState, _countDownToStartTimer and _gamePlayingTimer] as ServerRpc which basically Fire off an event to start game - Implemented WaitingForOtherPlayersUI.cs

- Synchronous MultiplayerGame Pause and Unpaused. - GameManager.cs Implemented two ServerRpc() in order to Pause and Resume the Game using Dictionary (ClientID). - PauseMultiplayerUI.cs enable player to Show and Hide "WaitingForPLayerToResume" Canvas.

Player Disconnects Scenarios. - GameManager.cs has implemented autoTestGamePausedState which is monitoring on Server API and Called in LateUpdate. - GameOverUI.cs and GamePauseUI.cs has implemented ReplayBtn and Shutdown Server. - HostDisconnectUI.cs enable user to display Disconnection. - In case Server or Host get disconnected. It will shutdown server

Connection Approval - Late Joining Lobby - GameManager.cs has implemented a IsWaitingToStart() to check current GameState. - KitchenGameMultiplayer.cs replaced StartHost, StartClient and ConnectionApprovalCallback which indicate and handle joining scenario.

- Connection Scene Flow - CharacterSelectScene.unity - It allows us to wait in the lobby and ready for the next battle - CharacterSelectReady.cs handles SetPlayerReadyServerRpc() using KeyValuePair (Dictionary) - CharacterSelectUI.cs It allows us to Set Player as Ready - ConnectingUI.cs It handles callback using EventHandler OnTryingToJoinGame and OnFailedToJoinGame to Show or Hide Panel. - ConnectionResponseMessageUI.cs It enable us to Display Message on KitchenGameMultiplayerOnFailedToJoinGame. - LobbyScene.unity has implemented to display lobby status. - LobbyUI.cs It does contain two buttons to CreateGameLobby and JoinGame. - GameManager.cs modified and implemented two new events are as follows - OnClientDisconnectCallback It informs back to Server if someone disconnected - OnLoadEventCompleted It allows us to Instantiate new player using ClientID - KitchenGameMultiplayer.cs have implemented new two events. - OnTryingToJoinGame It invoked on ConnectionApprovalCallback and OnStartClient - OnFailedToJoinGame It invoked on ConnectionApprovalCallback and OnClientDisconnectCallback - Loader.cs added two new Scenes. LobbyScene.unity and CharacterSelectScene.unity - Implemented new Static LoadNetwork() in order to load Scene on Server. - MainMenu.unity modified workflow which leads to Lobby - MainMenuCleanup.cs It just Cleanup NetworkManger and KitchenGameMultiplayer if it persist after switching scenes.

- CharacterSelectScene.unity - Implemented new Scripts are as follows: - CharacterColorSelectUI.cs It allows you to select specific color using select overlay and fire off events - CharacterSelectPlayer.cs It allows you tell the server that a client is ready to start a game. - PlayerVisual.cs It contains actual MeshRenderer to replace with selected color. - PlayerData.cs - It holds the localPlayer data like ClientID, Color etc. - Fixed - StoveCounter.cs had an issue regarding FryingState ("Raw meat" you aren't suppose to pick up while frying)
